Text.val: Author: Martin Wenta (MW)
This module calculates the amount legal collection interest and costs based on
the currently outstanding invoices.
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
21.04.2011 JOH SCR16392 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
04.04.2011 GB SCR16338 Extended selection of the part1, changed calculation for
the PO.LEGALCOSTSC
31.01.2007 SH SCR12271 Added 2 new output parameters for BAD216
12.12.2005 MW SCR#9699 --> Changed V1-update condition in part 2
01.12.2005 MW SCR#9591 --> Changed the 'PI.TYPE'-param for BAD216-call
to CLNT301_INTEREST
Coming from BAD216
If all INVOICE rows are handled then update totals as follows
Call BAD216 to calculate the interest
01.12.2005 MW SCR#9591 --> Changed the 'PI.TYPE'-param to CLNT301_INTEREST
12.12.2005 MW SCR#9699 --> Changed V1-update condition
Update of output param with max value
Recalculation and update of output param

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and :3
